quoteFirst: Prices are moderate, and range from
quoteLast: shillings. For lower tastes or leaner purses, there are the Bowery theatres, where melodramas, variety shows, and harlequinades are served up, and the price of admission is but sixpence or a shilling.
title: Jonathan and His Continent: Rambles Through American Society
author: O'Rell, Max, 1848-1903; Allyn, Jack; BlouÃ«t, Mary Bartlett [Translator]

quoteFirst: The London mail is, naturally, the most important mail which leaves Bristol. In the course of the day fifty-five mail bags are forwarded, containing about 20,000 letters; the trains used being those leaving at 3.10 a.m., 7.50 a.m., 9.35 a.m., 11.40 a.m., 12.13 p.m.,
quoteLast: , 3.0 p.m., 3.43 p.m., 4.45 p.m., 7.22 p.m., and 12.45 a.m. So numerous are the London and "London forward" letters in the evening, that three clerks are engaged from 5.0 p.m. to midnight in sorting them. In the opposite direction fifty mail bags are received from London daily, containing about 30,000 letters.
title: The Bristol Royal Mail: Post, Telegraph, and Telephone
author: Tombs, Robert Charles, 1842-1923

quoteFirst: In 1875 the Constitutional Committee, by a vote of
quoteLast: , defeated the proposition to so amend the constitution as to make women electors under the same regulations and restrictions as men.

quoteFirst: At times, we are happy to learn, he is tolerably composed. The number of persons specially appointed by the doctors is reduced from
quoteLast: , and his principal pages are admitted, and have been for some time, to attend upon him, as when he enjoyed good health.--His Majesty dines at half-past one o'clock, and, in general, orders his dinner: he invariably has roast beef upon the tables on Sundays. He dresses for dinner, wears his orders, &c.
title: Social England under the Regency, Vol. 2 (of 2)
author: Ashton, John, 1834-1911

quoteFirst: In point of fact, after what he had seen in the last few minutes, he was not at all anxious to force the issue to actual battle. A good strong bluff would suit him a great deal better. Even odds of
quoteLast: were not good enough considering the demonstration he had witnessed.
